Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Pk Exp buses temp. rerouted via Michigan, Cermak, State, 25th, I-55 South, DuSable LSD near Roosevelt/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump, #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, Cermak, State, 25th, I-55 South, DuSable Lake Shore Drive near Roosevelt/Madison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Grand/State
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Lasalle, Jackson, Clark, Harrison and State: due to, street blockage near Grand/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Lasalle, Jackson, Clark, Harrison and State: due to, street blockage near Grand/State.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems at 95th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems at 95th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
